div.h3: food for students during school closure

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.p:
Grab-and-go lunches and breakfasts are available free of charge to students ages 18 and under at the following locations: Hayshire Elementary School, Stony Brook Elementary School, Central York High School and the York Learning Center.
Students in need of a meal should visit these locations between 12PM-1PM on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays.
Panther Pantry Curbside Pick-Up Night April 21
If your family is in need of food and household items, please visit the Panther Pantry from 5-6PM Tuesday, April 21, at Central York Middle School, 1950 North Hills Road, York.

div.h3: continuity of education plan for central york school district
div.p:
Central York School District has submitted its Continuity of Education Plan to the PA Department of Education.
To view the plan, please click here.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: If you need support for a device that is not working, please visit https://www.cypanthers.org and complete the form requesting assistance OR call the dedicated hotline (717) 814-4180. We will have tech support staff available to assist with issues remotely or to make arrangements to exchange a device, if needed.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: For parents/guardians who need assistance with Skyward/Schoology access, please email familyaccess@cysd.k12.pa.us. Please also reference the attachment, provided by our Technology Support Teachers.

div.h3: school board meeting planned for monday, April 20

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: The Central York School District Board of School Directors will hold a virtual public meeting at 6:30PM Monday, April 20, 2020. The meeting agenda will be available via the following link prior to Monday’s meeting:

span.style: text-decoration: underline;;color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Anyone wishing to take part in or attend the Central York School District April 20, 2020 School Board Meeting is required to provide an email address to the District so that the District may email the meeting ID and password.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: text-decoration: underline;;color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: to complete your request to attend the School Board Meeting. You will be emailed a meeting ID and password needed to join the School Board meeting via the email you provided.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;
p.span: If you wish to share comments to be read during the meeting, they may be emailed to Mr. Brent Kessler, Board Secretary, at

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;
p.span: If you do not receive your meeting ID and password when the meeting begins, please email Mr. Joseph Lucia, Director of Technology, at jlucia@cysd.k12.pa.us for assistance. (Please note – passwords and meeting IDs will be sent after 4:30PM on the day of the meeting).

div.h3: cYSD Schools CLosed, Activities Cancelled through end of school year by state mandate

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.p: Central York School District continues to monitor the developing situation related to the Coronavirus in Pennsylvania.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

strong.span: All schools in Central York School District are closed now and students and teachers are participating in online instruction/distance learning. Please stay tuned for more information as it becomes available.

div.div: Central York School District775 Marion Road, York, PA 17406 | Phone 717-846-6789 | Fax 717-840-0451
